entry.title: DJ Ferchi
entry.summary: BienvenidosMy name is Fernando Pantoja and I am well known as DJ Ferchi. I am currently working in Central & Northern New York, NYC, and South America providing DJ entertainment in clubs, restaurants, lounges, and bars with my 4000W sound system and extensive dancefloor lighting system as needed. I provide specialized music dance party sets for the following genres: Hip Hop, Reggaeton, Salsa, Bachata, Merengue, Cumbia and Crossover. For an awesome Latin/ hip-hop entertainment experience, hit me up at 315-566-9138 or email me at pantojafernando@gmail.com Please note that I will be out of town doing a tropical tour with family from 6 October through 30 November 2019. Fernando Pantoja DJ Ferchi Sound System DjFerchi.com
entry.content:
Bienvenidos

My name is Fernando Pantoja and I am well known as DJ Ferchi. I am currently working in Central & Northern New York, NYC, and South America providing DJ entertainment in clubs, restaurants, lounges, and bars with my 4000W sound system and extensive dancefloor lighting system as needed.

I provide specialized music dance party sets for the following genres: Hip Hop, Reggaeton, Salsa, Bachata, Merengue, Cumbia and Crossover.

For an awesome Latin/ hip-hop entertainment experience, hit me up at 315-566-9138 or email me at pantojafernando@gmail.com

Please note that I will be out of town doing a tropical tour with family from 6 October through 30 November 2019.

Fernando Pantoja
DJ Ferchi Sound System
DjFerchi.com
